greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The first occurrence of n in A111701.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{m = n, k = 1}, While[ IntegerQ[ m/Prime@k], m = m/Prime@k; k++ ]; m]; g[n_] := Block[{k = 1}, While[f@k != n, k++ ]; k]; Array[g, 67]
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Feb 04 2006
